resources.string:
In this app you will get Online as well as Live news and read newspaper. 
 The feature of this app is given below- 

 1. Bangla Newspaper and Local newspaper. 
 2. Top English Newspaper of BD. 
 3. Intenational Newsportals and live News. 
 4. Sports News of bd as well as International.
 5. Live NewsPortal of Bangladesh and some Live news Channels.

 if you have any issue with this app please don't hasitate to contact with us. 

 Developed BY : 
 Sadnan Sakin 
 Email: robinhat8@gmail.com
